segments.text: Can you show me how to use this phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can help you with that . Pick up the receiver and hit one of the buttons . Do you hear a tone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next you dial 9 on the keypad . You should hear the tone change . Did you hear it change ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Well , after you get the line to change you have an outside line . Who are you trying to call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am trying to call a client .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To call a number on the outside you now just dial the number . For inside calls , punch in the extension number . Has someone given you an extension list ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't know anyone's extension .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All of the extensions are listed on the wall chart over there if you ever need help .
segments.speaker: S2
